definitions.definition: A male monarch; a man who heads a monarchy. If it's an absolute monarchy, then he is the supreme ruler of his nation.
definitions.example: Henry VIII was the king of England from 1509 to 1547.

definitions.definition: A powerful or majorly influential person.
definitions.example: Howard Stern styled himself as the "king of all media".

definitions.definition: Something that has a preeminent position.
definitions.example: In times of financial panic, cash is king.
Oi mate, have you got kings?

definitions.definition: To crown king, to make (a person) king.
To perform the duties of a king.
To assume or pretend preeminence (over); to lord it over.
To promote a piece of draughts/checkers that has traversed the board to the opposite side, that piece subsequently being permitted to move backwards as well as forwards.
To dress and perform as a drag king.
A drinking game that uses playing cards.
A sounding stone, a Chinese musical instrument.
